name: Solan
description: Known as the 'Mushroom City of India', Solan is a district in Himachal Pradesh famous for its pleasant climate, educational institutions, and industrial development. The district is home to the famous Shoolini Mata Temple and offers various trekking opportunities.
summary: A perfect blend of education, industry, and nature

locations.name: Shoolini Mata Temple
locations.description: Ancient temple dedicated to Goddess Shoolini, offering panoramic views of the surrounding hills.

locations.name: Kasauli
locations.description: Colonial hill station known for its scenic beauty and peaceful atmosphere.

locations.name: Chail
locations.description: Former summer capital of Patiala, known for its cricket ground and palace.

locations.name: Barog
locations.description: Scenic town known for its railway station and trekking trails.

locations.name: Dagshai
locations.description: Historic cantonment town with colonial architecture and scenic views.
